attributes.action: No to Sharia law  and Islamic Law in Britain and Ireland
attributes.additional_details:

These Sharia Courts have been issuing rulings against Britain's common law as well as European Union Laws. Abolish Sharia controlled zone: that enforce the Islamic law in the UK.

'Muslims should in engage in Taqiyya and lie to non-Muslims to advance Islam.

Our forefathers fought and died for our country Britain and Ireland; It's time we say NO to Islamic law and the Sharia Law in Britain!!!
